about_the_game: Expand your fighter's journey with the TEKKEN 7 Season Pass and gain access to stunning DLC packs at a discounted price. Challenge your skills, your friends and rivals with two additional playable characters, a new game mode and hundreds of additional costumes. As an exclusive gift for purchase, receive over 30 metallic costumes for your characters and shine in the Iron Fist Tournament!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, GTX 750Ti 2GB, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
